attributes.action: Replace the 'first-past-the-post' electoral system with a proportional one
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If two political parties run for an election and one of them wins by a majority of 51:49, that party is in charge of the country because just over half of the country wants them in power. Yet they are in power against the will of the other half of the country. How is that a fair electoral system?
  We should have an electoral system where a party gains power on the basis of what percentage of the country wants them in power, not on whether they have a majority vote. We should have a voting system where every part gets power based on how many MPs they have, not if the have more than the others.
  Lets reform our electoral system now!
